## LogsInitConfiguration.usePciIntake property

Use PCI-compliant intake. See <a href="https://docs.datadoghq.com/data%5C_security/pci%5C_compliance/?tab=logmanagement" target="_blank" rel="noopener">PCI DSS Compliance</a> for further information.  false

**Signature:**

```typescript
usePciIntake?: boolean;
```
